subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rashard Lewis, Orlando’s big off-season acquisition, scored a career playoff-high 33 points and the Magic beat the Detroit Pistons, 111-86, on Wednesday night.
snippet: Rashard Lewis, Orlando’s big off-season acquisition, scored a career playoff-high 33 points and the Magic beat the Detroit Pistons, 111-86, on Wednesday night.
